title: shape of flow field pytorch
body:
Hello,

I have a question regarding the shape of the flow (displacement) field derived from the pytorch version of VoxelMorph. In "SpatialTransformer" you reverse the order of the (grid) channels:

![Screenshot from 2022-11-23 16-27-11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29921239/203584744-1aa27906-33b2-4640-a98f-a69032d4e65a.png)

I got the point, that this is because of the function "torch.nn.functional.grid_sample", where this is required.

From this I assume the following: 
"torch.nn.functional.grid_sample" expects the grid to have shape (N, D, H, W, 3) = (N, D, H, W, [d, w, h]). So this then means, that the flow originally has shape (N, [h, w, d], D, H, W). 

Is this assumption correct? 
(This information is important to me, since I am transforming points and need to make sure to have the appropriate shape.)

Thanks a lot!
